title: Grok images have broken the law, says AI Minister
description: Images created on the social media platform X break the law, the Minister for Artificial Intelligence has said.
content:
Niamh Smyth said she has not heard back from the company after requesting a meeting.
Ms Smyth was speaking after it was reported that users of the social media platform were using its AI tool, Grok, to produce naked images of people, including childr... [3025 chars]

title: Haveli to buy majority stake in contract software firm Sirion
description: U.S. private equity firm Haveli Investments has agreed to make a majority investment in Sirion, which provides software that uses artificial intelligence to draft, store and manage business contracts,...
content: Jan 8 (Reuters) - U.S. private equity firm Haveli Investments has agreed to make a majority investment in Sirion, which provides software that uses artificial intelligence to draft, store and manage business contracts, the companies said on Thursday.... [1292 chars]

title: How Artificial Intelligence is transforming everyday life
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has become an essential part of everyday life, influencing how people work, communicate, and make decisions.
content:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) has become an essential part of everyday life, influencing how people work, communicate, and make decisions.
What was once considered advanced technology is now integrated into common tools and services, making daily acti... [2221 chars]

title: Hipster robots and cuddly artificial intelligence take over Las Vegas
description: The annual Consumer Electronics Show is a smorgasbord of futuristic technology products
content:
Do you need a $500 (€430) noise-reducing ice-cube maker? What about a giant hologram machine or a lolly that makes music while you eat it?
The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas offers a glimpse into the gadgets of the future. The week-long... [4261 chars]

title: Indian AI models should be distinct, promote indigenous content: PM Modi
description: New Delhi, Jan 8 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday said the world’s trust in India is its biggest strength and emphasised the need to ensure that Indian Artificial Intelligence (AI) models are ethical, unbiased, transparent, and based on data privacy principles. He also said the Indian AI models should be distinct and should […]
content:
The prime minister said startups and artificial intelligence entrepreneurs are the co-architects of the country’s future.
As many as 12 Indian AI startups that have qualified for the ‘AI for ALL: Global Impact Challenge’ summit to be held next month ... [2650 chars]

title: AI features available in English to U.S. clients
description: More artificial intelligence is being implanted into Gmail as Google tries to turn the world’s most popular email service into a personal assistant that can improve writing, summarize far-flung information buried in inboxes and deliver daily to-do lists.
